name: Cut the Virus
description:
Cut all the viruses and protect blood cells... That's it!

Controls

Use mouse to point position and press left mouse button when the move is possible you can release it to cut the virus!

On touch screen devices you do the same but you have to press with your finger

Keep pressing to see if move is possible in pointed direction and if you want to make a move you HAVE to cut the virus!

Press F12 to toggle fullscreen (Windows only)
